meanings.definition: The identification of the nature of an illness or other problem by examination of the symptoms.
meanings.sent1: The doctor's diagnoses helped determine the cause of the patient's fever.
meanings.sent2: Medical professionals rely on accurate diagnoses to provide proper treatment.
meanings.sent3: The detective's diagnoses of the crime scene led to the surprising revelation.
meanings.sent4: Her keen diagnoses of the situation allowed her to make informed decisions.
meanings.sent5: The accurate diagnoses of the problem saved the company from a major setback.

meanings.definition: The identification of the nature of an illness or other problem by examination of the symptoms.
meanings.sent1: Tim's diagnoses from the doctor confirmed his suspicions about his health.
meanings.sent2: The hospital's lab conducts various diagnoses to assist in patient care.
meanings.sent3: The teacher's diagnoses of the students' progress were always on point.
meanings.sent4: The mechanic's diagnoses of the car issue were quick and precise.
meanings.sent5: The accurate diagnoses of the problem saved the company from a major setback.
